HOW TO USE

  1. Simply apply your favorite conditioner or wet your hair with water.
  2. Now brush vertically to take out the toughest knots.
  3. You can use the sectioning tip to section in between as needed

WHAT SETS US APART

Well First of all We listen,Â EzDetanglerâ„¢ PRO was made from countless feedbacks from our real customers.

  1. Feedback: All these slippery products make detangling brushes super slippery and almost impossible to hold. -- Shanice C. from Raleigh, NC

  1. Feedback: I have 3 heads in the house with completely different textures, Each of their head needs different tools to detangle. Save me!! â€“Â FeliciaÂ L from Fresno, CA
    • Solution: Our locking clip gives it the versatility you need. Simply adjust it to the top row of pinholes at the back of the panels for detangling long, thin type. Adjust it on the bottom row to take on the short and coarse hair type

entry.title: Scalp Massage Shampoo Brush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ez Detangler Brush
Type:
Price: 14.95

Did you know scalp massageÂ helps promote blood flow, and helps nutrients reach the hair roots

Our EZ Scalp Massage BrushÂ and transform your routine shampoo day into an invigorating experience. It gently stimulates your scalp to make you feel relaxed and refreshed. Feel the stress fade away as it improves your blood circulation and increases the vitality of your hair.Â 

Â The secret to healthy hair starts at the scalp. When laden with dead skin and product residues, itâ€™s difficult for your hair to grow and thrive. Thatâ€™s why you need EZ Scalp Massage Brush to exfoliate your scalp and set you free from dandruff, itchy scalp and clogged pores.

Key Benefits :Â 

  • Boosts hair growth,Â restores the vitality of your hair and improves the condition of your scalp.
  • Promotes healthy blood flow, so hair nutrients can properly reach the roots and make them healthy and moisturized.Â 
  • Easy-to-grip handle, wonâ€™t slip from your hands while in use and allows you to control the pressure you apply to the brush.
  • Safe to use for all hair types without causing breakage.
  • Saves you money from spending on pricey hair spa and scalp massage.

How to Use :Â 

  • Separate hair into 2 to 4 sections.
  • Take one section, wet the hair slightly then apply shampoo.
  • Smooth through with your fingers, then wrap your hand around the scalp massage brush handle.
  • Â Press against your scalp and gently move it around your scalp area
  • Massage that section for 3 to 5 minutes then pin-up and repeat the process with other sections.Â
